scripts.build:copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/pkg && if [ -d src/rust/pkg ]; then cp -R src/rust/pkg/* dist/pkg/; fi
scripts.build:obfuscate: for file in dist/*.js; do javascript-obfuscator "$file" --output dist-obf/"$(basename "$file")" --compact true --self-defending true; done
scripts.build: (command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:wasm) || echo 'wasm-pack not found, skipping wasm build'; npm run build:bundle && npm run build:copy-wasm && npm run build:obfuscate
